description: Creamy yoghurt panna cotta topped with a sweet cherry reduction and pistachios, make this healthier dessert for an elegant end to any meal.
keywords: Panna cotta,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Egg free,Healthier Easier
name: Yoghurt Panna Cotta With Cherry Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 60g rice malt syrup (save 28 g for later)

recipeInstructions.text: Spray 6 x 1-cup (250ml) capacity ramekins with oil.

Place 1/2 cup milk in a microwave-safe bowl and sprinkle over gelatine. Stand for 5 minutes or until gelatine has softened. Stir to combine. Microwave, uncovered, on medium for 30 seconds or until gelatine has dissolved.

Place syrup, cinnamon and remaining milk in a small saucepan over medium heat and bring to a simmer. Stir in gelatine mixture, then strain mixture into a medium heatproof bowl. Stand for 30 minutes or until cooled slightly. Whisk in yoghurt. Divide mixture among ramekins. Refrigerate for 4 hours or until set.

Meanwhile, bring cherries, extra syrup and 1/2 cup water to the boil in a small frying pan over medium-high heat. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer, uncovered, for 5 minutes or until sauce thickens. Refrigerate until required.
Turn panna cotta out onto serving plates. Spoon over cherry sauce and scatter over pistachio. Serve.
